LockView.Sett.Enable_Hint: Enables the module on the local (TV's) client
LockView.Sett.ScreenWidth_Hint: The real world screen width in mm or inch. Must be set on the local (TV's) client
LockView.Sett.Gridsize_Hint: The real world grid size in mm or inch (e.g. 25 mm or 1 inch). Unit has to be the same as 'Screen Width'. Must be set on the local (TV's) client
LockView.Sett.ForceEnable_Hint: Enables the module on all non-GM clients
LockView.Sett.LockOverride_Hint: Enter a keybinding to override the zoom and pan lock
LockView.Scene.Autoscale.Label: Autoscale
LockView.Scene.Autoscale_Hint: Automatically calculates a scaling factor to either fit the scene to the screen, or so the grid is always the same physical size on the screen
LockView.Scene.ForceInit_Hint: Forces the view to the 'Initial View Position' after loading the scene. Note: only works if 'Autoscale' is set to 'Off'
LockView.SetView.Title: Set View
LockView.UI.NoConnect: No connected and enabled clients on this scene
